text: If an agency fails to meet any of the goals set forth in § 2-218.41, the Department may require that a portion of the agency's contracts and procurements be made part of a set-aside program for small business enterprises.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2352 of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-33, see notes following § 2-218.01.

DC CODE § 2-218.52

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Small, Local, and Disadvantaged Business Enterprise Development and Assistance.
